html.p: You can get menial labouring work, hauling bundles of furs and logs, for a meagre 2 Gold Pieces a day (plus free food and board). Each day you spend working, 2 is added to your Time Track, and time is precious on your quest! Click here to work. Click here when you've finished your work stint.
